text: "If You Needed Somebody" is a 1990 song by British band Bad Company. It was taken from their 9th studio album Holy Water. It went to number 16 in the United States making their biggest hit since Rock 'n' Roll Fantasy and number 51 in Canada. ==References== Category:1990 songs Category:Bad Company songs Category:Arena rock songs Category:Hard rock songs
title: If You Needed Somebody
